meanings.definition: A person who raises irritating and trivial objections.
meanings.sent1: The caviller in the meeting kept complaining about small details.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a caviller and just enjoy the movie without nitpicking.
meanings.sent3: The caviller at the party made everyone laugh by pointing out the mismatched socks.
meanings.sent4: Her brother was a caviller, always finding faults in her artwork like a magnifying glass.
meanings.sent5: The caviller's constant fault-finding made him unpopular among his friends.
